"A guest user logged-in for the first time. \nApp ID assigned this user’s identity to his anonymous profile, so his previous selections are saved. The anonymous token previously used to access this profile is now invalid."

"A user started to use the app anonymously, made some selections, and then logged in. \nSince he had logged in in the past, the app switches over to his existing identified profile in place of his anonymous profile."

"An identified user logged in for the first time. A new Profile was created on App ID. \nNow when he logs in with the same credentials from any device or web client, the app will show his same profile and selections."
"A known identified user logged in again. His Profile is fetched from App ID.
"A guest user started using the app. \nApp ID created a new anonymous profile, where the user’s selections can be stored. Note that this anonymous profile is only available from this device."
"A guest user returned. \nThe app uses his existing anonymous profile, so his previous selections are shown. Note that this anonymous user profile is only available from this device."
"An identified user returned to the app with the same identity. \nThe app accesses his identified profile and the previous selections that he made."
"The user signed back into the device with a different identity (e.g. was with Facebook, now with Google). The profile related to the identity he currenlty logged in with is now shown."
